5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Ali bin Abu Talib said:“When the Prophet (ﷺ) stood up to offer a prescribed prayer, he said Allahu Akbar and raised his hands until they were parallel to his shoulders. When he wanted to bow he did likewise; when he raised his head from bowing he did likewise; and when he stood up after the two prostrations he did likewise.”

chapter.ara-name: باب رَفْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ إِذَا رَكَعَ وَإِذَا رَفَعَ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ الرُّكُوعِ
chapter.eng-name: Raising the hands when bowing, and when raising the head from bowing
